snippet.title: Two Weeks in Painland trailer
snippet.description:
Unusual Games announces their debut video game: Two Weeks in Painland, release date December for Windows and Mac. 

 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1139950/Two_Weeks_in_Painland/

In the game, you will play as a hacker blackmailed by Gustav, a mafia lord who wants to take some time off. Your mission, should you choose to accept it (his thugs have made it very clear that you don’t have much choice)? Keep his top lieutenants happy while he is gone. They’re a bunch of wacky criminals doing even wackier stuff. Oh, and this won't be easy, as you will only have your computer as a tool to succeed in each peculiar task.
